title: Our Programs
description: UCLA Health's integrative medicine programs deliver evidence-based, patient-centered primary and consultative care. Learn more about our programs here.
cleaned_text: Find your care As leaders in integrative medicine, our experts are here to deliver exceptional care. Call [310-267-8271](tel:310-267-8271) to schedule an appointment. UCLA Health Integrative Medicine Programs The vision of the clinical pillar of the Integrative Medicine Collaborative is to deliver evidence-based, patient-centered primary and consultative care, providing a coordinated entry point for patients to access integrative medicine services at UCLA health in both the inpatient and outpatient setting.
